Description: Two fragments of probably the same New Kingdom Book of the Dead, with vignette of very fine quality, and very crudely drawn hieroglyphic text.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Count Guglielmo Libri
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134636) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134636)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary Black ink Pigment Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Hinged cover: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: Two fragments, partly cut by modern collector along some edges, other edges torn.
